scripts.build-ts: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: npx tsc --project tsconfig-esm5.json && npx tsc --project tsconfig-esm6.json && npx tsc --project tsconfig-esm2018.json && mkdir -p dist/bundles && npx rollup -c rollup.config.js && npx rollup -c rollup.config.js --environment NODE_ENV:production
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-ts
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run magickApiJs && npm run copy
scripts.copy: npm run copy-magickJs && npm run copy-magickWasm && mkdir -p dist && cp magick.js magickApi.js magick.wasm dist && mkdir -p dist/bundles && cp magick.js magickApi.js magick.wasm dist/bundles && cp magick.js magick.wasm spec/assets && cp -r spec/assets dist
scripts.copy-magickJs: rm -rf magick.js && cp webworker.js magick.js && cat ImageMagick/utilities/magick.js >> magick.js
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-node-prepare: cp tests/rotate/node_header.js tests/rotate/node.js && cat ImageMagick/utilities/magick.js >> tests/rotate/node.js && cp magick.wasm tests/rotate
scripts.test-node: npm run test-node-prepare && cd tests/rotate && node node
scripts.test-browser: rm -rf dist && npm run test-browser-build  &&  npm run copy && ls -R && gulp --gulpfile spec/gulpfile.js jasmine
scripts.test-browser-server: rm -rf dist && npm run test-browser-build && npm run copy && gulp --gulpfile spec/gulpfile.js jasmine-server
scripts.test-browser-start: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run copy && npm run test-browser-watch-all
